columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: RESIDENCE_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is intended to store the patient's residence code. It was developed to meet New Jersey reporting requirements. It identifies a patient's municipality in a way more specific to the state than zip code alone.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined
